infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ClientClub behöver åtkomst till din plats för att visa närliggande butiker och möjliggöra platsbaserad verifiering.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ClientClub needs access to your camera to scan QR codes at participating stores.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ClientClub needs access to your photo library to upload profile or receipt images.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: ClientClub needs access to your microphone to enable audio features within the app.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: ClientClub behöver åtkomst till din kamera för att skanna QR-koder i deltagande butiker.
plugins.microphonePermission: The app accesses your microphone to let you record audio.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera for scanning QR Codes
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to enable audio features
